wikipedia_page.main: Ashley Carter (born 12 September 1995) is an English footballer who plays for Southern League Premier Division Central side Stourbridge, where he plays as a defender.

response: On 4 March 2016 Dyer was one of four players to join Conference North side Tamworth, he signed a deal running until the end of the season, and was joined on the same day by Kaid Mohamed and Ashley Carter, who joined on loan from Eastleigh and Wolverhampton Wanderers respectively, as well as youth player Michael Wright. Dyer was named on the bench the following day for a fixture away at Stockport County, but didn't make it on to the pitch.
